title: Live the dream life in our gorgeous community! Stop by for a tour!
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Oak Run Apartment Homes!', 'Located at:', '7878 N Main St', 'Jonesboro, GA 30236', 'Rental Information:', '# of Bedrooms: 2', '# of Bathrooms:  1', 'Square Footage: 950 sq ft', 'Rental Pricing: $1262 - $1528/month', 'Contact our leasing office at', 'show contact info', 'Our experienced, caring office staff delivers excellent service, and our trained maintenance team provides 24 hour emergency maintenance so residents can live carefree lifestyles.', 'Stop looking and start living at Oak Run!', 'Community Features:', '◾ Convenient Online Rental Payments', '◾ Grill', '◾ Laundry Facilities', '◾ Maintenance on site', '◾ Sparkling Pool', '◾ Sundeck', '◾', 'Well Equipped Playground', '◾ Wi-Fi at Pool and Clubhouse', '◾ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance Service', '◾ Convenient to Schools, Hospital & Medical Facilities', '◾ Easy Access to Airport & Interstate Highways', '◾ Easy Access to Bus Line', '◾ Lush, Professionally Maintained Landscaping', '◾ Minutes from Southlake Mall & Shopping On Mt. Zion Road', '◾ Package Service', '◾ Resident Referral Program', 'Unit Features:', '◾ Central Air Conditioning and Heating', '◾ Dining Room', '◾ Fully Equipped Kitchen', '◾ Heating', '◾ High Speed Internet Access', '◾ Mini Blinds & Verticals', '◾ Office', '◾ Range', '◾', 'Tub/Shower', '◾ Wall to Wall Carpeting', '◾ Balcony/Patio', '◾ Bright White Kitchen Cabinets', '◾ Cable TV/High Speed Internet Ready', '◾ Designer Wallpaper Borders*', '◾ Frost-Free Refrigerator', '◾ Split Bath/Vanity Area', '◾ Vinyl Flooring', '◾ Walk-In Closets', '◾ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '◾ Window Coverings', 'Office Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'Sat: 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM', 'show contact info', 'Pet Policy:', 'Pets Welcome!', 'Non-aggressive breeds accepted.', 'Weight Restrictions may apply.', 'Please see the office for fees & other details!', 'Leasing Options:', '13-Month', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Management:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '27EC866414394923']
